text.p: Sunday, June 3 will mark two milestones for Calvary Chapel of Austin: 9 years of meeting as a fellowship, and 3 years in our current building. Don't know where we are? Check out the Location page.

Calvary Chapel is a non-denominational fellowship affiliated with Calvary Chapel-Costa Mesa in Costa Mesa, California. If you are looking for a church home in your area, please see the Calvary affiliates pages to find a Calvary near you.

As for this fellowship, the links listed below will provide you more information about who we are, where we've come from, and what we're all about. Explore and, if you'd like, contact us with any questions. View our history in Real Video.
